title: How Long Until Bitcoin Recovers from Its 50% Crash? The Last 3 Major Drops Offer Clues
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) has declined roughly 50% from its October 2025 peak of $126,000, and the mood has shifted from euphoria to fear in just four months. Sharp pullbacks feel brutal in real time, but they’ve been part of every major cycle. The question investors are asking now is how long Bitcoin recovery typically takes ... title: Inside Bitcoin’s wild nosedive near $60,000 – and what’s coming next
description: Bitcoin plummeted as low as $60,000 last week in its worst weekly decline in three years – baffling crypto bulls who long hailed the digital currency as a hedge against inflation.
